institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 33 (Changes to Use of Subsidies)
contents: Article 33 (Change in use of subsidy) ① Pursuant to Article 14, Paragraph 1, Items 2 and 3 of the Regulations, the Joint Training Center may apply for a change in business plan to the Chairman of the Board at least 30 days prior to the scheduled change date in any of the following cases. and the Chairman of the Board of Directors must notify the Joint Training Center of the results after deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee at least 3 days prior to the scheduled date of change to the business plan. 1. When the support fund under Article 19, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations is increased beyond KRW 100 million, revised on April 25, 2023, 2. Changed and used between each support item of labor cost, general operating cost, training facility/equipment cost, and program development cost. If you do. However, in relation to Annex Table 1, it may be excluded if there is a change from labor costs to general operating costs within the limit of 20 million won. Revised on November 12, 2020, 3. In the case of paying support funds (training facility costs, equipment costs, etc.) in excess of KRW 100 million to joint training centers participating in training tailored to corporate demand after examining the appropriateness of job analysis and course development. . However, program development costs can be excluded from deliberation and resolution by the deliberation committee. Revised April 25, 2023, ② Notwithstanding Paragraph 1, if any of the following applies, the Joint Training Center must apply for a change in the use of support funds to the Chairman of the Board at least 20 days prior to the scheduled date of change, and in this case, the Chairman of the Board shall review the appropriateness of the change. The joint training center must be notified of approval at least 3 days prior to the scheduled change date. However, considering the importance of the agenda, etc., the chairman may, if necessary, undergo deliberation and resolution by the deliberation committee in accordance with Article 33 (1) of the same rule. Revised November 12, 2020, 1. When subsidy is used for items that are not in the approved business plan due to changes in the investment plan for training facilities and equipment, etc. 2. The bid difference (execution balance) of training facility and equipment costs and program development costs 3. When the support fund under Article 19, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations is increased from the limit of 30 million won, 4. When the number of training courses is increased or a new training course is established. However, in the case of regular courses, they are operated in accordance with Article 32 of the Rules. Newly established 2020. 11. 12., ③ If the unit price of training facilities and equipment is changed through a lump sum contract in accordance with the procurement bidding contract procedure, the joint training center shall be subject to Article 14, Paragraph 2 of the Regulations, Article 14, Paragraph 2 of the Rules, Appendix 1 「Joint Training Center, etc. Support funds may be changed and executed through prior deliberation and resolution by the Steering Committee within the scope of not violating the “Detailed Standards for Support.” In this case, the joint training center must submit the results of the steering committee resolution to the Corporation by the scheduled change date.
